agenda_items.title: Welcome and Introduction
agenda_items.description: Remarks by Mayor Pro Tem Atkins and Introduction of Dawn F. Landry & Mark S. Mitchell.

agenda_items.title: Program Opening
agenda_items.description: Check-Ins and discussion on Council Alignment, Engagement, & Empowerment Framework.

agenda_items.title: Workshop Input
agenda_items.description: Full Group Participation in Shared Common Ground, Prioritization of Projects, and North Star Vision.

agenda_items.title: Long-Term Visioning Exercise
agenda_items.description: Workshop Input for Longer-Term Priorities for the City Based Upon the Identified North Star.

agenda_items.title: Final AIMing for Our Success
agenda_items.description: Finalize Our Rules of Engagement Output for the Future.
